name: Action Ninja Duck vs. Ugly Dragon
name_original: Action Ninja Duck vs. Ugly Dragon
description:
Ninja Duck action defense is here! Secret Ninja Duck tactics took on and battled evil. Help Ninja Duck destroy the Ugly Dragons and save the world! Choose wisely your Ninja Duck weapon. Fight opposing forces as you gather coins to unlock more weapons and more difficult but challenging levels. Powerups add to the excitement.

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap lower left to make Ninja Duck jump and twist upside down. Tap again and your Ninja Duck will turn right-side down. Ninja Duck can even run upside down! These are secret Ninja Duck tactics. Tap lower right to shoot, throw Ninja Stars, and other weapons. Collect coins to unlock new weapons and new levels. Powerups give you boost, more coins, and exciting fun.

-Amazing Graphics
-Cool Sounds
-Fun Characters

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!

EXCITING FUN!!

Download ‘Action Ninja Duck vs. Ugly Dragon’ now and have some fun.
